Reviews.Title: “Difficult to find in the dark!”
Reviews.Author: Bash07
Reviews.Content: Firstly, We took a taxi from the airport and were dropped off at the wrong hotel. Thankfully a local man at a petrol station spoke fluent English and was able to get us to the right hotel. Hotel Majestic was ran down but looked worse from the outside. Our room was nosy as we could hear the traffic outside during the night. Despite this the breakfast was lovely and the staff were very helpful in helping us getting around the city. Overall, only good for a CHEAP gettable.

Reviews.Title: “Rundown hotel”
Reviews.Author: mona p
Reviews.Content: A worn and cold room with dirty curtains and a very worn bathroom. Absolutely no atmosphere here at this hotel and no service at all.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: s0ller
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed from 6th -9th Sept,I must admit to being a bit apprehensive after reading some of the reviews,but my worries where unfounded.We loved the location so close to the K`dam and across the road the u bahn.I found all the staff at the Hotel very nice,a special thank you to Nigel for his help.Our room was spotless,breakfast was good and if I have occasion to be in Berlin again I would certainly return to the Majestic Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money”
Reviews.Author: jcfc33
Reviews.Content: Decent, clean hotel, ideal base for city break. Room was comfortable and adequate for our needs. Hotel staff friendly and helpful with typical tourist information. Nigel in particular was informative and courteous and being an Englishman, communication was not an issue. Breakfast was adequate, cheese, cold ham, eggs,cereal, fake o/j, a variety of breads etc, coffee was good. The hotel has a bar where 3 euros will but you a tasty German beer. The hotel is situated in a pleasant area called Wilmersdorf, in the west of the city. An underground station is just outside the hotel and can take you to the central Charlottesburg station where you can travel anywhere in Berlin, cheaply and quickly. It is also in walking distance to the Kurfurstendam main shopping avenue, also with regular buses. Overall, decent value for money, you will be out exploring the Wonderful city of Berlin most of the time!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: R0bbieD
Reviews.Content: The hotel was a great two star hotel. The room was clean and fresh (not old, stale and manky). They had a newly remodelled bathroom which was pleasant to be In. The breakfast in the morning was fair. Overall, I thought it was a good stay for the money. Don't come expecting a boutique hotel and you'll like it too!

Reviews.Title: “The other reviewers of this hotel must have been in an alternate universe!!”
Reviews.Author: AshinAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: We were given a weekend in Berlin that had a choice between this hotel and another in Mitte. After researching, I booked this hotel on the basis of the TripAdvisor reviews believing that between those and the pictures on both TripAdvisor and the travel agency website we would be ok staying here. We thought we would be staying at a hotel that was a basic pension style hotel - clean and simple, but customer friendly. The proximity to the metro eventually sold us on the hotel and we made a booking. What a mistake! On arrival our first misgivings set in when we were greeted with what seemed like a Fawlty Towers sketch from the receptionist, except he wasn't joking and it wasn't a sketch! He seemed incredibly eager to return to the computer in the backroom behind the reception to whatever he may have been doing and after a rudimentary explanation of the breakfast and where our room was he left us to it. The overwhelming impression was that we were wasting his time. We had a room on the fourth floor. Other than having a bleak, bare and miserable aspect, our room was dirty, the lights didn't work, the tap in the bathroom didn't work, there were wires hanging from the ceiling light fitting, the cupboard was broken (shelves laying in the bottom of the cupboard) the bath was dirty and the laminate flooring was peeling. The taps hadn't been run for a very long time and the water when it finally exited the tap was deep brown and full of muck. To say that the room had an Eastern Bloc ambiance about it would be complimentary. The breakfast was very disappointing. I hadn't known it was possible to completely mess up a breakfast until I stayed here. Curled up frankfurters, weak warm coffee, dried out cold bread, sad looking fruit, the whole works! The lady serving the breakfast was also incredibly unhelpful. This was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in, including in the Third World and my boyfriend rates it as his personal worst, including from his extensive experience of hostels all over Europe and in Eastern Europe. We checked out after one night and moved elsewhere, abandoning the extra nights we had paid for. A 88 euros per night I didn't think this was a cheap hotel and especially not for what we got. This is not a hotel, it is a low grade hostel. The nightly rate should be about 10 euros a night. Do yourself a favour and DO NOT STAY IN THIS HOTEL!

Reviews.Title: “wow, a gem for the price”
Reviews.Author: shilo-ann
Reviews.Content: We arrived not expecting much (given the price) but were pleasantly surprised. The rooms are very basic but large and clean, and the bed and pillows were comfortable. With restaurants along the street, a laundromat and supermarket behind and the train station across the road it was well located. The hotel staff are friendly with a bar downstairs. Breakfast was ok but coffee lovely. The lift only goes to the fourth floor so if you are on the fifth, prepare to carry bags up stairs.

Reviews.Title: “Close to the Underground & has a great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: MrsJaggs
Reviews.Content: This place was good for us. The breakfast was great with a selection of meat, cheese, bread, cereal, yoghurt, fruit, eggs, bacon, tea, coffee & delicious hot chocolate. Its close to the Underground, which will get you anywhere you wish to go easily. The beds were uncomfortable, but after moving the slats into the right place, they were ok. Some of the staff we spoke to at the reception desk, didn't understand english very well, but we got by ok.

Reviews.Title: “I liked it”
Reviews.Author: eddie1987
Reviews.Content: Basic hotel but it wasnt bad. I got on with the English guy who worked behind the desk but not really with the Germans. Sometimes you can hear the traffic in the early morning but it wasnt really a problem... Great location, underground station right by the hotel.. drinks are pretty cheap there aswell, 4 Euro for vodka and coke, 3 Euro for lager i think.. I would go there again in a few years.

Reviews.Title: “not very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: usus12
Reviews.Content: Location perfect but... We found the staff very unhelpful and unfriendly. The shower curtain was too short so the floor was flooded. Breakfast was good but again staff were not very welcoming,clearing the table while we were finishing our coffee.

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: sound_fury
Reviews.Content: we arrived in the Majestic hotel and stayed 4 nights. the staff is very friendly and although we arrived early in the morning they let us have the room. the hotel is located 2 steps from a U Bahn station and its 2 stations ride to the west berlin city center. the room are clean but small and the shower has no curtain, but its not really a bother. the rooms were cleaned daily, though the mattress was a bit old. for the money u pay for the hotel- its really a good 1 and its recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Majestic Is unmajestic!”
Reviews.Author: Angusthescot
Reviews.Content: This Hotel Is down as a 3 star but I'd say It was a one.The rooms are very basic.The Hotel Is dated and looks like It's been picked up from East Berlin and plonked In the West.The breakfast was o.k.Some of the staff were helpful.On the plus side It's In a excellent location.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and comfortable...”
Reviews.Author: Janelich
Reviews.Content: The location can't be any better; the hotel is just next to an underground station. Breakfast was wonderful, so as the people at the reception. The room was clean when we first came, and it was cleaned every day. It was quite, we didn't hear anybody exept of us. For the price we paid, it was fantastic. But, adding some decoration and painting the walls would make it much better.

Reviews.Title: “A good Berlin Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cadbury-the-hamster
Reviews.Content: The Majestic Hotel was clean, comfortable and welcoming! It is easily accessable with public transport, there is a U-bahn right outside the hotel, which will take you anywhere in the city and also directly to Schonenfeld Airport. The staff were friendly and happy to help with any problems that we had. I would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Amazing_badger
Reviews.Content: During our stay at the Majestic Hotel we encountered no problems, the room was clean and of a good standard, the breakfast service was very good. While not situated in the city centre as such, travel is no problem as a U-Bahn station is 50m from the door, and you can be in the cit centre in 20 minutes. It is also possible to get from the airport to the hotel for about €6.50. Public Transport in Berlin is excellent! You can also get to the Ku'Damm in minutes. The guy on nights was excellent and very helpful. Would happily return.
